block.p: Barbara Anne Sansone and Jerrold Michael Schwabe were married yesterday in East Hampton, N.Y. Mayor Paul F. Rickenbach Jr. of East Hampton officiated at the home of Mary Anne and Kevin Mulvey, friends of the couple.

The bride, 43, is a personal fitness trainer in New York and East Hampton. She graduated from the University of Colorado at Boulder. She is a daughter of Marie Sansone of Royal Oak, Mich., and Dr. Thomas Sansone of Clarkston, Mich., an obstetrician and gynecologist practicing in Bloomfield Hills, Mich.

Barbara Anne Sansone and Jerrold Michael Schwabe were married yesterday in East Hampton, N.Y. Mayor Paul F. Rickenbach Jr. of East Hampton officiated at the home of Mary Anne and Kevin Mulvey, friends of the couple.

The bride, 43, is a personal fitness trainer in New York and East Hampton. She graduated from the University of Colorado at Boulder. She is a daughter of Marie Sansone of Royal Oak, Mich., and Dr. Thomas Sansone of Clarkston, Mich., an obstetrician and gynecologist practicing in Bloomfield Hills, Mich.

The bridegroom, 54, is the chief executive of Herman Schwabe Inc. of Brooklyn, a manufacturing company for die-cutting machinery that is named for his late father, its founder. The bridegroom, a graduate of Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, is also a son of the late Gretl Schwabe.
